item.title: Bluesky Goes Dark in Mississippi Over Age Verification Law
item.description: Bluesky has chosen to block access in the state rather than risk potential fines of up to $10,000 per violation.

item.title: The Trump-Intel Deal Is Official
item.description: The $8.9 billion investment gives the US government a roughly 10 percent equity stake in Intel.

item.title: Meta partners with Midjourney on AI image and video models
item.description: Meta's chief AI officer said that the company is partnering with Midjourney to license its AI image and video model technology.
